snakeai.game.view module¶

GeneralView¶

class snakeai.game.view.GeneralView¶

Bases: object

The base class for any view of the game. If this is used, it does not show anything

getInput()¶
initScreen(dim, snake, apple, score)¶
quit()¶
updateUI(snake, apple, score, isGameOver=False)¶

GameGUI¶

class snakeai.game.view.GameGUI¶

Bases: snakeai.game.view.GeneralView

A GUI object for rendering and playing the game

This is the class used to make the user play.

Variables

SQUARE_SIDE (int) – the side of each square (in pixels)

getInput()¶

Get and returns input from the user

Returns

the current input

Return type

Actions or "QUIT"

initScreen(dim, snake, apple, score)¶

Create the window where the game will be shown

Parameters

  • dim (int) – the side of the board

  • snake (list(Coords))

  • apple (Coords)

  • score (int)

quit()¶

Close the game

updateUI(snake, apple, score, isGameOver=False)¶

Update the GUI with the current state of the game

Parameters

  • snake (list of Coords)

  • apple (Coords)

  • score int

  • isGameOver (Bool, default=False) – if set to True, it shows the game over screen
